description:
**Tool Overview**:

The Google Chrome releases page provides information regarding updates and vulnerabilities addressed in the Chrome browser. This includes security vulnerabilities, performance improvements, and new features introduced in recent versions.

**Details**:

1. The page tracks updates and their corresponding CVEs, particularly for Chromium-based browsers like Microsoft Edge.
2. It serves as a reliable source for administrators to monitor browser security and ensure their systems are up-to-date with the latest patches.
3. Users can reference changelogs, which detail bug fixes and enhancements, relevant to staying secure against known vulnerabilities.
4. This resource assists system administrators in understanding the security landscape of Chromium-based products.
5. Regularly reviewing this page is recommended to mitigate risks associated with aging software versions.

For more details, visit the [Google Chrome Releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024) page.
